Package skywaysolutions.app.customers

Interface ICustomerAccessor

All Superinterfaces:
IRepairable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerController
public interface ICustomerAccessor extends IRepairable
Provides the customer accessor interface for the package.
Author:
Alfred Manville

    • createAccount

      long createAccount(PersonalInformation info, Long planID, boolean customerDiscountCredited, String currency, String alias, CustomerType type) throws CheckedException
      Allows for an account to be created.
      Parameters:
      info - The personal information of the account.
      planID - The plan ID the account should use (Set to -1 for no plan).
      customerDiscountCredited - If the customer is credited by storing the discount.
      currency - The local currency of the customer.
      alias - The alias of the account.
      type - The type of the customer.
      Returns:
      The ID of the created account.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Account creation fails.

    • isCustomerDiscountCredited

      boolean isCustomerDiscountCredited(long customer) throws CheckedException
      This checks if the customer is accumulating discount credit.

      If false the discounts should be applied to each purchase. If true the discounts should be addCustomerDiscountCredit(long, Decimal) and the full price paid.

      Parameters:
      customer - The customer ID.
      Returns:
      If the customer is accumulating discount credit.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The customer information could not be retrieved.

    • setIfCustomerIsDiscountCredited

      void setIfCustomerIsDiscountCredited(long customer, boolean isDiscountCredited) throws CheckedException
      Sets if the customer is to accumulate discount credit.

      If false the discounts should be applied to each purchase. If true the discounts should be addCustomerDiscountCredit(long, Decimal) and the full price paid.

      Parameters:
      customer - The customer ID.
      isDiscountCredited - If the customer should accumulate discount credit.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The customer information could not be stored.

    • getCustomerDiscountCredit

      Decimal getCustomerDiscountCredit(long customer, boolean take) throws CheckedException
      Gets the customer discount credit, zeroing it if told to take it.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer ID.
      take - If the credit should be considered given.
      Returns:
      The value of the discount credit.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The customer information could not be retrieved.

    • addCustomerDiscountCredit

      void addCustomerDiscountCredit(long customer, Decimal amount) throws CheckedException
      Adds more customer discount credit.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer ID.
      amount - The amount of credit.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The customer information could not be stored.

    • getMonthlyPurchaseAccumulation

      Decimal getMonthlyPurchaseAccumulation(long customer, Date date) throws CheckedException
      Gets the monthly purchase accumulation used for flexible discount plans. If the given [Could be current] date is in a different month to the stored amount, the accumulated value should be zeroed and the current month set as the stored month.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer ID.
      date - The given [Could be current] date.
      Returns:
      The current monthly purchase accumulation amount.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The customer information could not be retrieved or updated.

    • addPurchase

      void addPurchase(long customer, Date date, Decimal amount) throws CheckedException
      Adds a purchase to the monthly purchase accumulation. If the given [Could be current] date is in a different month to the stored amount, the accumulated value should be zeroed and the current month set as the stored month, then the amount is added.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer ID.
      date - The given [Could be current] date.
      amount - The amount to add.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The customer information could not be updated.

    • listPlans

      long[] listPlans(PlanType type) throws CheckedException
      Lists all the available discount plan IDs given the type of plan.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of plan.
      Returns:
      An array of plan IDs.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The list of plans could not be retrieved.
